duties_responsibilities.duty: Prepare and install heavy-duty diesel engine vehicles for climatic chassis dynamometer tests.
Drive the truck on the chassis dynamometer and troubleshoot test vehicle issues affecting operation.
Maintain organized project documentation, communicate activity and status in a timely fashion, and maintain work area cleanliness.
Run vehicle tests, maintain test section conditions, and collect, monitor, and post-process test data.
Develop specialized test equipment as needed and operate engine monitoring software.
Troubleshoot, maintain, and repair chassis dynamometer test cell equipment under direction.

education_certification.credential: Associate in Technical Arts degree in Diesel Power Technology or equivalent
